text:
:slightly_smiling_face:Hello everyone! I'm Omar from Mexico. Self-taught R user and Python novice (Just web scraping). To be honest, I have seen a lot of information of why Julia is better than R&Python, so I am really interested in learning this language.

In addition, I was about to create a static page in R (Distill Rstudio) but then I started seeing everything Julia has ahead and even saw that with Franklin you can create a page! (Dunno how to do it at the moment but anyways I will figure it out)

Having this on the table, I am anxious to contribute to the community of Julia as much as possible :clap:

P.S. I was wondering if there is a channel regarding Julia Jobs/vacancies (Maybe instead of focusing in R&Python I should give a try to Full-Julia) :ok_hand:

elements.text:
Hello everyone! I'm Omar from Mexico. Self-taught R user and Python novice (Just web scraping). To be honest, I have seen a lot of information of why Julia is better than R&Python, so I am really interested in learning this language.

In addition, I was about to create a static page in R (Distill Rstudio) but then I started seeing everything Julia has ahead and even saw that with Franklin you can create a page! (Dunno how to do it at the moment but anyways I will figure it out)

Having this on the table, I am anxious to contribute to the community of Julia as much as possible
P.S. I was wondering if there is a channel regarding Julia Jobs/vacancies (Maybe instead of focusing in R&Python I should give a try to Full-Julia)

text: Welcome! For Julia jobs, there is <#C8P49NJHG|jobs>. I hope you enjoy Julia!
